sentences: Héctor Numa Moraes Rosa (Curtina, Tacuarembó Department, 28 April 1950) is a Uruguayan singer-songwriter and guitarist.
Exiled in the Netherlands during the civic-military dictatorship, he took part in the album Hart voor Chili (various artists).

In 2004 and 2005, Numa Moraes performed a series of shows with Erika Büsch entitled "Por el gusto de cantar" (for the love of singing), during which they performed at the Zitarrosa Hall in Montevideo and made a tour of the interior of Peru.
